Uses of Package
org.apache.ignite.cache.query

  • Packages that use org.apache.ignite.cache.query 
    Package Description
    org.apache.ignite
    Contains entry-point Ignite & HPC APIs.
    org.apache.ignite.cache.query
    Contains APIs for creating and executing cache queries.
    org.apache.ignite.client
    Contains Ignite Thin Client API classes.
  • Classes in org.apache.ignite.cache.query used by org.apache.ignite 
    Class Description
    FieldsQueryCursor
    SQL query result cursor.
    Query
    Main API for configuring and executing cache queries.
    QueryCursor
    Query result cursor.
    QueryDetailMetrics
    Query metrics aggregated by query type and its textual representation.
    QueryMetrics
    Cache query metrics used to obtain statistics on query.
    SqlFieldsQuery
    SQL Fields query.
  • Classes in org.apache.ignite.cache.query used by org.apache.ignite.cache.query 
    Class Description
    AbstractContinuousQuery
    Base class for continuous query.
    CacheEntryEventAdapter  
    ContinuousQuery
    API for configuring continuous cache queries.
    ContinuousQueryWithTransformer
    API for configuring continuous cache queries with transformer.
    ContinuousQueryWithTransformer.EventListener
    Interface for local listener of ContinuousQueryWithTransformer to implement.
    FieldsQueryCursor
    SQL query result cursor.
    IndexQuery
    Index queries work over distributed indexes and retrieve cache entries that match the specified criteria.
    IndexQueryCriterion
    Basic interface for IndexQuery criterion.
    Query
    Main API for configuring and executing cache queries.
    QueryCursor
    Query result cursor.
    ScanQuery
    Scan query over cache entries.
    SpiQuery
    Deprecated.
    Use ScanQuery, SqlFieldsQuery, IndexQuery instead.
    SqlFieldsQuery
    SQL Fields query.
    SqlQuery
    Deprecated.
    Since 2.8, please use SqlFieldsQuery instead.
    TextQuery
    Full Text Queries
  • Classes in org.apache.ignite.cache.query used by org.apache.ignite.client 
    Class Description
